definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Its support and contribution played a great role in prospering the Wei Kingdom (one kingdom in the period of Three-Kingdoms).
sentences.chinese: 汝潁大族的支持和貢獻對曹魏的強盛起著重要的作用。

sentences.english: The Chi-tan great families were closely related with the families?polarization of the tribe union period.
sentences.chinese: 契丹世家大族與部落聯盟時期的家族分化密切相關。

sentences.english: Consequently, Murong Huang reduced the displaced prefectures to displaced counties and further weakened the power of the Han establishments.
sentences.chinese: 慕容就將僑郡改置爲僑縣，進一步削弱大族的勢力。

sentences.english: Han imperial power and the enhanced powers of the decision of the Imperial College is bound to decline.
sentences.chinese: 皇權及大族權力的增強決定了太學勢必衰落的命運。

sentences.english: In order to survive in wars and riots, villagers often attached themselves to the large clans and thus became the obscure and dependent population.
sentences.chinese: 村民爲躲避戰亂和徭役，常投身大族，成爲隱附人口。

sentences.english: While Nahshon was the prince of the whole tribe of Judah.
sentences.chinese: 當時拿頌是猶大族的王子。

sentences.english: The Yu clan in Kuiji is a famous aristocratic family of the Jiangdong area during Six Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 會稽虞氏是六朝著名的江東世家大族。

sentences.english: Do not be afraid to go down to Egypt, for I will make you into a great nation there.
sentences.chinese: 你下埃及去不要害怕，因爲我必使你在那裏成爲大族。

definition: land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
